title: Is it worth it to study for a BA program with philosophy at JMC Delhi? - Quora

response.answer_text: I think that depends a lot on what your priorities are and what you’d like to pursue as a career. If you’re interested in philosophy as a course, go for it. JMC is a great institution for a great, well-rounded experience. However, if you’re taking up this course just because of the college name or reputation, I’d suggest reconsidering and prioritising the course over the college!
